quote_first: “Should you be having caffeine at”—Olive glanced at the clock—“
quote_last: ?” Come to think of it, he shouldn’t be having caffeine at all, given his baseline shiny personality. And yet the two of them got coffee together every Wednesday. Olive was nothing but an enabler.
title: The Love Hypothesis
author: Ali Hazelwood

quote_first: Mr Harcourt woke up with mysterious suddenness at
quote_last: , and, by a curious coincidence, it was at that very instant that the butler came in with two footmen laden with trays of whisky, brandy, syphons, glasses and biscuits.
title: England, Their England
author: AG Macdonell
